imageprocessing

Class ProducerConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • imageprocessing.ProducerConsumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProducerConsumerInterface, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Consumer, Producer

    public abstract class ProducerConsumer
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ProducerConsumerInterface
    Abstract class that extends Thread Class and implements ProducerConsumerInterface Producer and Consumer Thread will extend this class and will Override process() method
    Author:
    Constantin Gheorghe
